answers.answer: My husband and I don't bring in more than 2k together a month and they did not approve me for medicaid worst case Obama care.. not the best insurance trust me.. but any is better then none. Apply for all the assistance u can get including stamps and wic they will help u tremendously in the long run.
They go off how much total you make not what u bring home.Medicaid will often go by the previous year income. Try Medicaid but if not, there is Obama care

You can apply without your husband. Medicaid looks at your current situation you can look online for state income guidelines. I would have preferred Obamacare but had lost my job so was forced on Medicaid.  Now that I'm working again I'll ride Medicaid out until the baby is born. I hate that I can't see my regular PCP because they don't take Medicaid as well as most good pediatricians.
Medicaid goes off household income if your married.
I'm sure thou can apply. I'm not married but did have uhc as a primary insurance and had Medicaid as secondary. it really helped financially.

I'm on medicaid. As soon as I got pregnant.  I got approved.  Well try using just your own income. I make okay but when I found out I got approved.  I cancelled my Kaiser insurance.  Saved 200 bucks for 9 months. That's going towards baby stuff
